collection.openText: "Rise, my servants. Rise and serve me."

specialTipSize.specialTip: If Qliphoth Counter reaches 0, $0 and his disciples will advent again.
<Caution> $0, unlike other abnormalities, periodically decreases Qliphoth Counter. It is recommended to frequently visit $0 and check its status.
When the work result was good, Qliphoth Counter increased. Also, physical and mental health of every employee in the facility was healed.

When the work result was moderate, Qliphoth Counter increased by a moderate chance.Also, the physical and mental health of the employees that are stationed in the department where $0 is contained was healed.
When the work result was bad, Qlihpoth Counter decreased. Also, every employee in the department where $0 is contained took White damage.

etc.param: Do not fear, for I am with you. You cannot leave until I allow you to.

Do not deny me, for I am in front of your eyes.
